author: Tiffany Dreyer
comment: It never gives me the option to send to my phone. Everything is connected, but the app never progresses past the creation stage. I've emailed for a fix twice with no response. I would love to use this app, but I can't.

author: Darrin DiSimo
comment: I like the app.  It is easy to add any picture as the background.  One minor issue/request.  Most of my pictures are of landscapes and have the sky at the top of the image.  It would be nice to be able to move where the time is located.  For most of my pictures I would like the time to be at the top of the watch.  Thanks.

author: Dre Day
comment: Easily the best watch face I've had. I could nitpick about a few other things it could have, but given we're given a choice of pics, time, date & weather for FREE. I'll save the nitpicking. Great job

author: Matthew Neureuther
comment: More options would make this the best watchface ever! A step counter widget and actually make the icons widgets so I can hit the weather and go to the app or hit the calendar and go to Agenda!
title: Great, but...

author: Daniel Haitink
comment: It works nice, however it does not keep the flat tire look in mind. It will stretch the image to fit on the screen instead of cutting the lower edge off.
title: Nice with problems

author: Johanna Rogers
comment: This. Is. Awesome!!! So far, so good. I deleted my other two watchface that used my images as a wallpaper since this one has everything I need: time, date, batt... weather is a plus. Pretty happy with this watchface and the customizable font is just icing on the cake. Thank you!
title: Deleted my other photo watchface

author: jim ballantyne
comment: Huawei smart watch 2 sport wish that I had found this watch face sooner its brilliant well done to the dev team this is now my number one watch face what are you waiting for guys download it now

author: Chris Purchase
comment: Would be a great watch face but often the weather doesn't update so you're left with two bars where the weather should be. Would be perfect otherwise. Fix this and I'd have it as the permanent watch face

author: Stephen Bonnett
comment: No option to upload to phone that I can see so not very useful.

author: mathios nikakis
comment: Great! It would be good to add a feature so that the clock can remain in the middle all the time like in ambient mode and not shift to the bottom.
title: LG urbane

author: Tommy Tran
comment: very nice app let me customize my own pics and the always on screen watch is big enough and show the info that I need.

author: Jay Kunwar
comment: U should add fitness widget like steps count and compass..!

reply.author: Leo Link
reply.content: You can easily change to Celsius in Settings.

title: Great work

author: Jeff George
comment: Exactly what I was looking for and with zero ads! Definitely worthy of a 5 star review.  Nice job. Leo Link, very nice work.

author: Leo Castro
comment: I have no option for skyscrapers background, only options from my gallery or camera. No other option are available

author: Tim Larkin
comment: This is a great way to put your own pictures, or any other pictures you want, on your watchface.  Thanks
title: Put your photos on your watch

author: Bob Scott
comment: Love it, if you could move the position of the clock and add an outline or shadow to the digits it would be five stars

comment: I need the option to keep the screen on longer. Say..... 20 seconds.

comment: Wow!! I love that you can use your own pictures on your watchface

author: Andrew Goldstein
comment: Excellent app and very easy to use, even though it has a number of customization features. Had a minor technical issue, and the developer immediately responded and solved my problem.   Really pleased with purchase. Using on Nexus 6 (Marshmallow) on original LG G Watch.

author: Tony Sobczak
comment: Excellent app. Ability to use any photo including one from camera on the face a plus. Easy manipulation of photos on the face.

comment: Great app
title: Thank you for the update.  I love this app and I use it everyday

comment: This is an incredible app. Easily put any photo you like including the ability to take a shot within the app and easily put it on your watch face. Hours of fun lol
